mapper.select: SELECT ID, STATUS_DATE AS statusDate, DRANK, NOTES, REG_DATE AS regDate, UPD_DATE AS updDate FROM DRINK_STATUS WHERE STATUS_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY STATUS_DATE
SELECT ID, STATUS_DATE AS statusDate, DRANK, NOTES, REG_DATE AS regDate, UPD_DATE AS updDate FROM DRINK_STATUS WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRINK_STATUS (ID, STATUS_DATE, DRANK, NOTES, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE) VALUES (NEXT VALUE FOR DRINK_STATUS_SEQ, #{statusDate}, #{drank}, #{notes}, #{regDate}, #{updDate})
